citation.title: DNA sequencing of a cytogenetically normal acute myeloid leukaemia genome.

comment.text: Mediates export of organic anions and drugs from the cytoplasm. Mediates ATP-dependent transport of glutathione and glutathione conjugates, leukotriene C4, estradiol-17-beta-o-glucuronide, methotrexate, antiviral drugs and other xenobiotics. Confers resistance to anticancer drugs. Hydrolyzes ATP with low efficiency.
Additional isoforms seem to exist. Experimental confirmation may be lacking for some isoforms.
Lung, testis and peripheral blood mononuclear cells.
Belongs to the ABC transporter superfamily. ABCC family. Conjugate transporter (TC 3.A.1.208) subfamily.

comment.name: Atlas of Genetics and Cytogenetics in Oncology and Haematology
ABCMdb
comment.text: Database for mutations in ABC proteins

property.value: Cobalamin (Cbl, vitamin B12) transport and metabolism
F:ATPase activity, coupled to transmembrane movement of substances

feature.description: In isoform 2, isoform 5, isoform 6 and isoform 8.
In isoform 3, isoform 5, isoform 7 and isoform 8.
In isoform 4, isoform 6, isoform 7 and isoform 8.
No effect on leukotriene C4 and estradiol glucuronide transport; dbSNP:rs45511401.
Increases resistance to vincristine and decreases resistance to VP-16.
Decreases resistance to vincristine, VP-16 and doxorubicin.
Only partially affects protein maturation; impairs leukotriene C4 transport.
Impairs protein maturation and leukotriene C4 transport.
No effect on protein maturation and leukotriene C4 transport.
Slightly impairs leukotriene C4 and estradiol glucuronide transport.
Impairs leukotriene C4 and estradiol glucuronide transport.
Slightly impairs leukotriene C4 and estradiol glucuronide transport.
Strongly reduced transport of leukotriene C4, estradiol glucuronide and of glutathione.
Reduced transport of leukotriene C4 and of glutathione.
Reduced transport of leukotriene C4, estradiol glucuronide and of glutathione.

Impairs estradiol glucuronide transport; loss of resistance to alkaloid vincristine, cationic anthracyclines, epipodophyllotoxin VP-16, but not potassium antimony tartrate; partial loss of resistance to sodium arsenite.
